兾字的基本解释

兾
jì
古同“冀”。

兾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jì］
［《廣韻》几利切，去至，見。］
亦作“兾1”。
(1)企图；非分地谋求。
(2)希望；盼望。
(3)犹记，记载。参见“冀闕”。
(4)古九州之一。参见“冀州”。
(5)古国名。春秋时并于晋，为郤氏食邑，故地在今山西省河津县。
(6)河北省的简称。
(7)姓。春秋时晋国有冀芮、冀缺。见《左传·僖公十年》、《国语·晋语八》。

兾字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【八字部】　兾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页128第20
【韻會】冀或作兾。【書·禹貢】兾州。【玉篇】同冀。

兾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
兾字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
jì
Gu Tong "Ji".
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jì］
["Guangyun" is a bit sharp, go to, see you. ]
Also known as "Yuan 1".
(1) Attempt; indiscriminately seeking.
(2) Hope; hope.
(3) Still remember, record. See "Ji Que".
(4) One of ancient Kyushu. See "Jizhou".
(5) Ancient country name. It merged in Jin during the Spring and Autumn Period, and was the food town of Queshi, whose hometown is Hejin County, Shanxi Province.
(6) Abbreviation for Hebei Province.
(7) Last name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Shanxi had Ji Rui and Ji Que. See "Zuo Zhuan·Xi Gong Ten Years", "Mandarin · Jin Language Eight".
Yin

[Rhyme Club] Ji or Zuoyu. 【Book·Yugong】Yanzhou. [Jade articles] Tongji.
